title: How to Fold a Napkin Into the Basic Silverware Pouch

steps.title: Fold the napkin
steps.content: Fold the napkin into fourths. You can do this by folding the napkin in half, and then folding it in half again.

steps.title: Take the first layer on top of the napkin, and fold it diagonally.
steps.content: Take the first layer on top of the napkin, and fold it diagonally.

steps.title: Fold the right side of the napkin almost halfway to the center.
steps.content: Fold the right side of the napkin almost halfway to the center. Then, press it down flat.

steps.title: Repeat the previous step for the other side.
steps.content: Repeat the previous step for the other side.

steps.title: Flip the napkin over.
steps.content: Flip the napkin over. You'll now see a neat fold in place. Insert your silverware/chopsticks and you're all set.
